attributes.additional_details: We are all sick of the chaos and indecision being caused by Government and Parliament and horrified by the power struggles that have nothing to do with the good of the people of this country. A referendum will further divide opinion but a general election will give the Government chosen the mandate to govern. If this is not done soon civil unrest will follow and democracy will be trashed.
attributes.background: Whether we voted leave or remain this has to be the way forward. The people are in power not the MPs
